metadata.name: Flowers
metadata.description:
"We shall have beds filled with light odours, couches deep as tombs, and, set out on shelves, rare flowers which bloomed for us under more beautiful skies".
Charles Baudelaire

Intimate project that has its roots in the relationship that man has with the female dimension and the landscape.

The matrix of the image as in almost all my works is analog. I started by scanning the Instax and then I did some digital post production work.
